# Swirled Chocolate Cheesecake

## Ingredients

### Crust

* 1.5-2 cups crushed chocolate cookies (Oreo ends work well)
* 0.33-0.5 cups margarine

### Filling

* 2 oz sweet chocolate
* 2 Tbl instant coffee
* 1 Tbl water
* 1.5 cups sour cream
* 12 oz cream cheese
* 0.5 cups sugar
* 2 eggs
* 1 tsp lemon rind, grated
* 0.5 cups mini chocolate chips
* 1 Tbl flour

## Instructions

### Crust

Mix the crushed cookies and margarine. Press onto the bottom of a 9 inche spring form cake pan.

### Filling

Melt teh chocolate with water and instant coffee. Set aside. Mix the suor cream, cream cheese, sugar, and eggs. Pour in the cake pan with the chocolate crust. Swirl in the chocolate-coffee mix. Mix the chocolate chips with the flour and sprinkle on top.  Bake at 350&deg;F for 30-35 minutes.
